74  [[nodiscard]] double team_angle() const {
75  const bool defend_plus_x = config_client_.game_settings().defend_plus_x;
76  return defend_plus_x ? -M_PI_2 : M_PI_2;
77  }
78 
83  [[nodiscard]] rj_geometry::TransformMatrix world_to_team() const {
84  rj_geometry::TransformMatrix world_to_team = rj_geometry::TransformMatrix::translate(
85  0, config_client_.field_dimensions().length / 2.0f);
86  world_to_team *= rj_geometry::TransformMatrix::rotate(static_cast<float>(team_angle()));
87  return world_to_team;
88  }
